channel.title: [ENDED] $100 CASH Contest - Gameplay Video Montage
channel.description: We're announcing a :money_mouth: **$100 CASH** (+Extra gift) contest (delivered by PayPal or Google Wallet) **for the best 2-minute gameplay video montage!** Some YouTubers/Streamers have given us permission to use their video content to make such a montage that have a **[MontageContestOK]** role added to their [Discord](https://discord.gg/gvNbRSB) name. Click their name to see, then find their best video moments on YouTube! **RULES:** 1. You must be in our [Discord](https://discord.gg/gvNbRSB) channel. 2. The video should be 2 minutes, give or take 10 seconds (in 720p, seems to be average video). 3. At the end of the video, **credit** the list of awesome youtubers content you used 4. Must keep the audio (let's hear some fun voiceover montages too from these guys) 5. **Only** use content of tubers that have the **[MontageContestOK]** Discord role. Listed below. 6. Let us know you plan to participate below. 7. Do NOT monetize (enable ads) for your video * [Howezy16](https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLtratxuDuMDxeYVgWUqbKl1XR3HO9jhc4) * [Magnasword2 (Moragna)](https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLIzdtMEH7_YiUC-jcdLKmYllRHlHkNKVp) * [Noble Rogue](https://www.twitch.tv/joeythou) * [PipeTron](https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLxNaVfI2lRhF-5IdPVwbnv77S01s0knBS) * [PurpleyPete](https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLuellvwNG8OMWWsGlG4dqetf-_rYerQj9) * [Skimm (TwoPercentSkimm)](https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLrqc2fgFy9ig_BVY5EweEd2eh-M6-G48r) * [Tormental](https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLJxFurWeM5PN6jyxo376FvdbBNnQwEYI7) * [Gamateers](https://www.twitch.tv/thegamateers/videos/all) * [TrixRidiculous](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=BCEtt1RzZvQ) * [Wahooz](https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLvG1ca7m-qOL0xKu1ib5AKuhF0FJjp8tL) * [HyperAds224](https://www.twitch.tv/hyperads224/videos/all) *(If any @Streamers/YouTubers ♘ does not yet have this role, but wants it, LMK :)* ---------- * Submit as early as you want via YouTube (publicly). Contest ends 6/30 @ 11:59pm EST. * Judged by Imperium42 team. No need for votes (those are dumb). * Winner gets **$100 cash** + _an extra prize choice_. Runner-ups get FREE keys (yes, plural) to giveaway! **EDIT:** FYI, we also have [another contest](https://www.ThroneOfLies.com/contest) giving away 20 game keys to 10 people!

item.title: [ENDED] $100 CASH Contest - Gameplay Video Montage
item.dc:creator: í42-Xblade
item.description:
And the winner is … @Discoteca for $100 CASH!!! + either a free shipment of ToL swag or 5 free keys >> her choice!

For her epic montage originally @ https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=cDg1EEgKoeM , then she allowed us to commandere it to our YT page, where we added some English subtitles and credited everyone involved with a link to their own YT video @ https://youtu.be/np9BuxqEqG0

CONGRATULATIONS!!

Everyone else that participated with any submission, and at least tried, DM me on Discord you get a couple free keys!

Special mention to @PandaPete who made a comedic sketch quoting me wearing no pants during the green screen recording LOL!! I need to be careful where I post this stuff https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=s0MyJgPzw8g

Purpley gets a bonus key for effort ;D

Read full topic

item.title: [ENDED] $100 CASH Contest - Gameplay Video Montage
item.dc:creator: í42-Xblade
item.description:
We’re announcing a $100 CASH (+Extra gift) contest (delivered by PayPal or Google Wallet) for the best 2-minute gameplay video montage!

Some YouTubers/Streamers have given us permission to use their video content to make such a montage that have a [MontageContestOK] role added to their Discord name. Click their name to see, then find their best video moments on YouTube!

RULES:

  1. You must be in our Discord channel.
  2. The video should be 2 minutes, give or take 10 seconds (in 720p, seems to be average video).
  3. At the end of the video, credit the list of awesome youtubers content you used
  4. Must keep the audio (let’s hear some fun voiceover montages too from these guys)
  5. Only use content of tubers that have the [MontageContestOK] Discord role. Listed below.
  6. Let us know you plan to participate below.
  7. Do NOT monetize (enable ads) for your video
  • Howezy16
  • Magnasword2 (Moragna)
  • Noble Rogue
  • PipeTron
  • PurpleyPete
  • Skimm (TwoPercentSkimm)
  • Tormental
  • Gamateers
  • TrixRidiculous
  • Wahooz
  • HyperAds224

(If any @Streamers/YouTubers ♘ does not yet have this role, but wants it, LMK

  • Submit as early as you want via YouTube (publicly). Contest ends 6/30 @ 11:59pm EST.
  • Judged by Imperium42 team. No need for votes (those are dumb).
  • Winner gets $100 cash + an extra prize choice. Runner-ups get FREE keys (yes, plural) to giveaway!

EDIT: FYI, we also have another contest giving away 20 game keys to 10 people!

Read full topic
